title: Love Disorder
description: A few months shy of being 18, Riri Chance's mother passed away. With no other relatives to take her in, she had no choice but to go with leading female celebrity, Uno, because of a prior agreement with her mother. More than the enigma, the beauty, and the riches, there was something strange about Uno. Something that made Riri question her sexuality, her emotions, and more importantly, her sanity.
author: Yuriko Hime
